items.content_html: A lightweight CLI tool that decodes Kubernetes Secret YAML files by converting base64-encoded `data` fields into human-readable `stringData` fields. Perfect for debugging, auditing, and managing Kubernetes secrets.
items.title: KevinWang15/decode-k8s-secrets: A lightweight CLI tool that decodes Kubernetes Secret YAML files by converting base64-encoded `data` fields into human-readable `stringData` fields. Perfect for debugging, auditing, and managing Kubernetes secrets.

items.content_html: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
items.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.

items.content_html: 42resources is a lightweight browser extension designed to assist 42 students in finding relevant resources for their projects. It provides curated links to blogs, videos, and testing tools, making it easier for users to learn, debug, and improve their work.

It provides curated links to blogs, videos, and testing tools, making it easier for users to learn, debug, and improve their work.

items.content_html: ChatWorld is a lightweight, real-time global chat application that lets you instantly connect with people around the world. No sign-up required - just enter your name and start chatting!

items.content_html: A lightweight and modular SDK for interacting with the Wix Headless CMS API. This library simplifies content management operations such as retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting CMS items, making it easier to integrate Wix CMS into your projects.
